name: Killer capybara
description:
hey, i was really stressed while making this for many reasons but heres a sollution to all of the bugs

1. to use the orb press E whilst touching it

2. when you touch the great gravity(fire ball thing) you use the mouse to invert gravity

3. the whirling wind is invisible but its a ball in front of you 

Disclamer to activate a power up touch the item.

Disclamer2 press r to restart a level
